trans-unit.source: Serves as the root container for state machine workflows.
trans-unit.target: Funciona como o contentor de raiz para fluxos de trabalho de máquina de estado.

trans-unit.source: Contains event-driven activities and states.
trans-unit.target: Contém atividades condicionada por eventos e os Estados.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The StateMachineWorkflowActivity is an activity container used to create workflows that follow a state machine model.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]O StateMachineWorkflowActivity é um contentor de actividade utilizado para criar fluxos de trabalho que se seguem um modelo de máquina de estado.

trans-unit.source: The StateMachineWorkflowActivity is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, which means the StateMachineWorkflowActivity can contain other activities.
trans-unit.target: O StateMachineWorkflowActivity é um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, que significa que o StateMachineWorkflowActivity pode conter outras atividades.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>

trans-unit.source: The StateMachineWorkflowActivity and the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> activities are the only permitted child activities of the StateMachineWorkflowActivity.
trans-unit.target: O StateMachineWorkflowActivity e <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>atividades são os únicos permitido atividades subordinadas do StateMachineWorkflowActivity.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> activities are permitted because the root activity itself behaves like a state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>as atividades são permitidas porque a atividade raiz próprio comporta-se como um Estado.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you can have <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> activities at the root level that are used by all the State activities in the StateMachineWorkflowActivity.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte, pode ter <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>atividades no nível de raiz que são utilizadas por todas as atividades de estado a StateMachineWorkflowActivity.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> activities at this level provide a global mechanism for processing workflow events and automate state transitions.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>Atividades neste nível de fornecem um mecanismo global de processamento de eventos de fluxo de trabalho e automatizar transições de estado.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> activities provide a mechanism to define the various stages in the model.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>Atividades fornecem um mecanismo para definir várias etapas no modelo.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>

trans-unit.source: The StateMachineWorkflowActivity has properties that are required for the execution of the state machine workflow.
trans-unit.target: O StateMachineWorkflowActivity tem propriedades que são necessárias para a execução do fluxo de trabalho de máquina de estado.

trans-unit.source: Most notably, the StateMachineWorkflowActivity has two properties that are important: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateNameProperty> and <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateNameProperty>.
trans-unit.target: Mais especificamente, o StateMachineWorkflowActivity tem duas propriedades que são importantes: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateNameProperty>e <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateNameProperty>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateNameProperty> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateNameProperty>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateNameProperty> of the state machine is the state in which the state machine is when an instance of the state machine is created.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateNameProperty>da máquina de estado é o estado em que a máquina de estado é quando uma instância da máquina de estado é criado.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateNameProperty>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateNameProperty> property is mandatory and must be provided when a StateMachineWorkflowActivity is created.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateNameProperty>propriedade é obrigatória e tem de ser fornecida quando é criado um StateMachineWorkflowActivity.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateNameProperty>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateNameProperty> of the state machine is like any other state activity that is contained within the state machine.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateNameProperty>da máquina de estado é como qualquer outra atividade de estado que está contida dentro da máquina de estado.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateNameProperty>

trans-unit.source: The state activity can be a direct child of the StateMachineWorkflowActivity root activity and a StateMachineWorkflowActivity can have only one <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateNameProperty>.
trans-unit.target: A atividade de estado pode ser um subordinado da atividade raiz StateMachineWorkflowActivity direto e um StateMachineWorkflowActivity só pode ter um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateNameProperty>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateNameProperty>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateNameProperty> of the StateMachineWorkflowActivity is a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> activity that is designated as the end state of the StateMachineWorkflowActivity.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateNameProperty>o StateMachineWorkflowActivity é um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>atividade que é designada como o estado de fim do StateMachineWorkflowActivity.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateNameProperty>

trans-unit.source: When a transition is made to the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateNameProperty>, the workflow execution is completed.
trans-unit.target: Quando é efetuada uma transição para o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateNameProperty>, a execução do fluxo de trabalho foi concluída.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateNameProperty>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateNameProperty> is not mandatory.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateNameProperty>não é obrigatório.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateNameProperty>

trans-unit.source: This means that you can have a StateMachineWorkflowActivity that is not completed.
trans-unit.target: Isto significa que pode ter um StateMachineWorkflowActivity que não seja concluída.

trans-unit.source: This does not mean that the state machine workflow is always active in memory.
trans-unit.target: Isto significa que o fluxo de trabalho de máquina de estado está sempre ativo na memória.

trans-unit.source: The StateMachineWorkflowActivity might be unloaded as it waits for an event.
trans-unit.target: O StateMachineWorkflowActivity, pode ser descarregada que aguarda a um evento.

trans-unit.source: StateMachineWorkflowActivity activities that never complete are especially useful in processing long running business transactions, as in the case of a purchase order received by a supplier.
trans-unit.target: As atividades de StateMachineWorkflowActivity que nunca concluí são particularmente útil no processamento de transações de negócio, como no caso de uma nota de encomenda recebida por um fornecedor de execução longa.

trans-unit.source: The fact that the purchase order was fulfilled does not mean that the purchase order process is over.
trans-unit.target: O facto de que a nota de encomenda foi concluída não significa que o processo de ordem de compra está acima.

trans-unit.source: The goods that are part of the purchase order might be returned or the purchase order might be amended and have additional items added to it after the fulfillment.
trans-unit.target: Poderão ser devolvidos bens que fazem parte de nota de encomenda ou a ordem de compra pode ser corrigida e itens adicionais adicionou ao mesmo após o cumprimento.

trans-unit.source: Sometimes there might be a requirement to keep the purchase order records for an extended period of time for legal or other purposes.
trans-unit.target: Por vezes, poderá ser um requisito para manter os registos de ordem de compra durante um longo período de tempo para efeitos legais ou outros.

trans-unit.source: The fact that a workflow does not finish just means that the workflow remains in an unloaded state.
trans-unit.target: O facto de que um fluxo de trabalho não for concluída apenas significa que o fluxo de trabalho permanece num Estado descarregado.

trans-unit.source: There may be a case for retiring the workflows, which means that after a set period of time the workflow instance may be forced to shut down.
trans-unit.target: Pode haver um incidente para extinguir os fluxos de trabalho, o que significa que depois de um período de tempo definido a instância de fluxo de trabalho poderá ser forçada a encerrar.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"> </xref> classe com o nome da atividade.

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: O nome definido pelo utilizador da atividade.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the end <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> of the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a extremidade <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref> do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: When a transition is made to the CompletedStateName, the workflow execution is completed.
trans-unit.target: Quando é efetuada uma transição para o CompletedStateName, a execução do fluxo de trabalho foi concluída.

trans-unit.source: The CompletedStateName is not mandatory.
trans-unit.target: O CompletedStateName não é obrigatório.

trans-unit.source: This means that you can have a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> that is not completed.
trans-unit.target: Isto significa que pode ter um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>que não seja concluída.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>

trans-unit.source: This does not mean that the state machine workflow is always active in memory.
trans-unit.target: Isto significa que o fluxo de trabalho de máquina de estado está sempre ativo na memória.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> might be unloaded as it waits for an event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>, podem ser descarregadas que aguarda a um evento.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateName%2A> and CompletedStateName, see <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateName%2A>e CompletedStateName, consulte <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The end <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> of the workflow.
trans-unit.target: O fim <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref> do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"></xref> that targets the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateName*> property.
trans-unit.target: Representa o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"> </xref> que visa a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateName*>propriedade.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateName*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the currently executing <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do atualmente em execução <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The CurrentStateName property only returns the name of the current state when accessed from within the workflow, for example, from a code handler in a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activity.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade CurrentStateName devolve apenas o nome do estado atual quando acessível a partir do fluxo de trabalho, por exemplo, a partir de um processador de código num <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>atividade.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>

trans-unit.source: The property does not work from host code because the host only has access to a copy of the workflow definition, and never to the live instance tree.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade não funciona a partir do código de anfitrião porque o anfitrião apenas tem acesso para uma cópia da definição de fluxo de trabalho e nunca à árvore de instância em direto.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] how to determine the current state from the host, see the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.CurrentStateName%2A> property of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance> class.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]como determinar o estado atual do anfitrião, consulte a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.CurrentStateName%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance>classe.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.CurrentStateName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O nome da atual <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition"></xref> that determines whether dynamic updates can be made in the workflow, when overridden in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition"> </xref> que determina se as atualizações dinâmicas podem ser efetuadas num fluxo de trabalho, quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition"></xref> that identifies when dynamic updates can be made.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition"> </xref> que identifica o quando atualizações dinâmicas que podem ser efetuadas.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> in which the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref> is when an instance of the state machine is created.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref> no qual o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"> </xref> quando é criada uma instância da máquina de estado.

trans-unit.source: The InitialStateName property is mandatory and must be provided when a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> is created.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade InitialStateName é obrigatória e tem de ser fornecida quando um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>é criado.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>

trans-unit.source: The InitialStateName of the state machine is like any other state activity that is contained within the state machine.
trans-unit.target: InitialStateName da máquina de estado é como qualquer outra atividade de estado que está contida dentro da máquina de estado.

trans-unit.source: The state activity can be a direct child of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> root activity and a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> can have only one InitialStateName.
trans-unit.target: A atividade de estado pode ser um elemento subordinado direto a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>raiz atividade e um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>pode ter apenas um InitialStateName.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] InitialStateName and <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateName%2A>, see <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]InitialStateName e <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateName%2A>, consulte <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> in which the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref> is when an instance of the state machine is created.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref> no qual o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"> </xref> quando é criada uma instância da máquina de estado.

trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"></xref> that targets the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateName*> property.
trans-unit.target: Representa o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"> </xref> que visa a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateName*>propriedade.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateName*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the previously executed <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do anteriormente executados <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The PreviousStateName property only returns the name of the previous state when accessed from within the workflow, for example, from a code handler in a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade PreviousStateName devolve apenas o nome do estado anterior quando acessível a partir do fluxo de trabalho, por exemplo, a partir de um processador de código <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>

trans-unit.source: The property does not work from host code because the host only has access to a copy of the workflow definition, never to the live instance tree.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade não funciona a partir do código de anfitrião porque o anfitrião apenas tem acesso a uma cópia da definição de fluxo de trabalho, nunca à árvore de instância em direto.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] how to determine the previous state from the host, see the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.StateHistory%2A> property of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance> class.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]como determinar o estado anterior do anfitrião, consulte a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.StateHistory%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance>classe.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.StateHistory%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the previous <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O nome do anterior <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue"></xref> that is used to change the state of a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue"> </xref> que é utilizado para alterar o estado de um <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: Este campo é constante.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.
